mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT("ROLE_", m.permissions) role FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN (SELECT menuId FROM sys_role_menu WHERE roleId = #{roleId, jdbcType=BIGINT}) r ON r.menuId = m.menuId

SELECT m.permissions FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN (SELECT menuId FROM sys_role_menu WHERE roleId = (SELECT roleId FROM sys_session WHERE sessionId = #{sessionId, jdbcType=VARCHAR})) r ON r.menuId = m.menuId

SELECT a.menuId, a.parentId, a.menuName, a.permissions, a.menuUrl, a.icon, a.menuType, a.menuFunc, a.visible, a.menuId spid FROM sys_menu a INNER JOIN sys_role_menu b ON a.menuId = b.menuId WHERE a.`status` = 1 AND a.menuFunc != 3 AND b.roleId = #{_parameter, jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY a.sort ASC
mapper.sql: menuId id, parentId pId, menuName name, icon, 0 checked, "treeFrame" target, CONCAT("sys/menu/goEditMenu.shtml?menuId=", menuId) url
mapper.update: update sys_menu set icon = #{icon, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifyUser = #{modifyUser, jdbcType=BIGINT}, checkValue = checkValue() WHERE menuId = #{menuId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND checkValue = #{checkValue, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_menu WHERE parentId = #{parentId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update sys_menu set status = #{status, jdbcType=TINYINT}, modifyUser = #{modifyUser, jdbcType=BIGINT}, checkValue = checkValue() WHERE menuId = #{menuId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND checkValue = #{checkValue, jdbcType=INTEGER}
